# `showGiottoSpatialInfo`

showGiottoSpatialInfo


## Description

show the available giotto spatial polygon information


## Usage

```r
showGiottoSpatialInfo(gobject)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`gobject`     |     giotto object
